def_cn: （旧时的）野蛮人，未开化的人
def_en: In former times, barbarians were people from other countries who were thought to be uncivilized and violent.
If you describe someone as a barbarian, you disapprove of them because they behave in a way that is cruel or uncivilized.

def_cn: 粗人；没教养的人；缺乏文艺修养的人
def_en: If you refer to people as barbarians, you mean that they do not know how to behave properly and do not like or understand art and culture.
